entity_id.description: The identifier for the entity that is being tested for authorization

authority_id.description: The identifier for the authority (e.g. ecosystem governing authority) that is being queried

action.description: The action that the query is checking Authorization for

resource.description: The resource that the query is checking Authorization for

time.description: Time for query to use. If blank, uses current server time. RFC3339 required, using only Z (+00:00) offset.

locator.description: Provided for systems that require additional information to locate the records in question.
